CustomField.description: The dollar value of the current line item knowing that it will always represent a quantity of one. However not all amounts will roll-up to the total application amount value as some will be pass-through charges.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The dollar value of the current line item knowing that it will always represent a quantity of one. However not all amounts will roll-up to the total application amount value as some will be pass-through charges.
CustomField.label: Amount
